1.0.name: wordpress/echeese
1.0.description: The eCheese plugin allows you to create polls for your blog and gives you enhanced reports, and unique features like cross-checking multiple polls. You create polls from the WordPress dashboard, and then you can use a poll widget to display it on your blog.
